description: /3/**Trying to reset datalink . . . ERROR couldn't load initial memory image**/3/
/3/**Trying to connect to emergency file server . . . ERROR server unreachable**/3/
/9/**GREG CORP EMERGENCY SYSTEMS v1.414.213562373095 - (c) 5132 GREG CORP**/9/
> Hello, If you are reading this, something went terribly wrong, we are deeply sorry.
> + Good news: Your data link is intact enough to start the emergency system
> + Bad news: The dimensional shift experiment went awry and you have no idea where you're at.
> + Bad news: We probably also have no idea where you landed at.

> + Bad news: The comunicator that was supposed to call back home in case of problems either broke or cannot reach home (otherwise it would have grabbed a clean coppy of the normal system for your datalink)
> + Bad news: you are basically stranded with not much more than what you got on you, until you can figure a device to get you out of here

> + Good news: your datalink should have all the blueprints for the required tech (or at least enough to start doing your own research), you just have to collect the resources and assemble all the things.
> â€” Dr. Marius Trucker, Head of Research and Developement, Greg Corp
/9/**END OF MESSAGES, HAVE A NICE DAY**/9/
